Everything All at Once Lisa Shiota 1 Create your open textbook Hello!!
2 Preface When it rains, it pours. Everything happens, all at once. How do you handle all that comes your way? How do you deal with the stress? This book will show you how.
3 Breathe As my yoga teacher says, > With every inhale, the body is nourished, > With every exhale, the body is cleansed. Inhale. Exhale. Repeat.
4 Eat Eat food. Not too much. Mostly plants. [In Defense of Food,] (https://michaelpollan.com/books/in-defense-of-food/) by Michael Pollan
